original_text: This is to my Father’s glory, that you bear much fruit, showing yourselves to be my disciples.
korean_text: 너희가 열매를 많이 맺으면 내 아버지께서 영광을 받으실 것이요 너희는 내 제자가 되리라

sentences.original_text: This is to my Father's glory
sentences.korean_translation: 이것은 내 아버지께 영광을 돌리는 것입니다

sentences.original_text: showing yourselves to be my disciples
